title: My phone is freezing after i got my phone repaired by google team
content:
Hi,
My phone was not charging in March and i contacted google team on toll free no provided on the box.Team changed the charging slot free as the phone was under warrenty.After i got my phone back after repair , my phone screen started freezing all the time and restarts again and again automatically.
After i got my phone back my country went to lockdown and till now i am not able to contact google team as they are working with limited team. I want to fix my phone as soon as possible.
